channel.title: Corruption Release! - Open Full server!
channel.description:
Well, This server has been around for a While and i thorught its best to just release it here. so here it is.
Corruption
Server Base: ZdiddyReloaded
Features: Full 1 VS 1 @ Edgeville & Mage Bank Wilderness Levels (Perfect) Correct Mage Bank Pking, Web Cutting, Lever Pulling, Etc AutoCasting with Ancients works Perfectly Replaced Ectos with Blood Runes Clue Scrolls (works great) Varrock, Edgeville, Hill Giants, Mage Bank PKing Areas More Correct Timers, No Massing, Good Eating, Etc Jad Area, Has Lots of HP and Drops Firecape on Occasion Correct Item Bonuses Perfect Granite Maul Special Godsword Specials, best you can get them on 317, including Sarasword New home!
Client Download: http://uppit.com/v/EIAGCSUX *Note* This is a ZDR client but editied ALOT, and this client isnt open :(, Sorry
Server Download: http://uppit.com/v/2EO4AWTC
Credits: Me Who ever make zdr, i think ben idk :S the rest of my friends who helped me think of what items ect to add in shops :p
Some Pictures:
[IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/Corruptionlogo.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/home.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/portals.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/Mainportalroom.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/slayer.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/Magebank.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/kq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/kbd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/jad.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/Gsminigame.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/dragons.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/daggs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/barows.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/Zgs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/Venggg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/SGS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i485.photobucket.com/albums/rr220/josh_p_2008/Corruption/Saraspec.jpg[/img]
I will be making a New server soon but not atm.
Please don't flame.

Well, This server has been around for a While and i thorught its best to just release it here.
so here it is.
